nodes.documentation: @dev Scale token constructor

@dev the inflation rate begins at 100% and decreases by 15% every year until it reaches 10%
at 10% the rate begins to decrease by 0.5% until it reaches 1%
nodes.name: adjustInflationRate

nodes.documentation: @dev anyone can call this function to update the inflation rate yearly
nodes.name: updateInflationRate

nodes.documentation:
@dev staking function which allows users to stake an amount of tokens to gain interest for up to 30 days
@param _stakeAmount how many tokens a user wants to stake
nodes.name: stakeScale

nodes.documentation:
@dev stake for a seperate address
@param _stakeAmount how many tokens a user wants to stake
nodes.name: stakeFor

nodes.documentation:
@dev stake function reduces the user's total available balance and adds it to their staking balance
@param _value how many tokens a user wants to stake
nodes.name: stake
getStakingGains

nodes.documentation:
@dev allows users to reclaim any staked tokens
@return bool on success
nodes.name: unstake
calculateStakeGains

nodes.documentation: @dev set the new totalStakingHistory mapping to the current timestamp and totalScaleStaked
nodes.name: setTotalStakingHistory

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows user to check their staked balance
@return staked balance
nodes.name: getStakedBalance

nodes.documentation: @dev allows contract owner to claim their mint
nodes.name: ownerClaim

nodes.documentation: @dev anyone can call this function that mints Scale to the pool dedicated to Scale distribution to rewards pool
nodes.name: poolIssue

nodes.documentation:
@dev sets the address for the rewards pool
@param _newAddress pool Address
nodes.name: setPool
calculateFraction
calculateMintTotal
